subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: The Yankees, who host the Subway Series beginning Friday, have won six of seven. But no team is playing as well as the Mets, who have a chance to do something they have never done in their history.
snippet: The Yankees, who host the Subway Series beginning Friday, have won six of seven. But no team is playing as well as the Mets, who have a chance to do something they have never done in their history.
